price: 21. Kuwa xidhiidhiya waxa uu Alle amray in la xidhiidhiyo13, oo ka baqa Rabbigood, kana cabsada Xisaab Daran.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ وَيَخَافُونَ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
footnotes: 13. Waa in aad loo ilaaliyo xiriirka qaraabada iyo deriska oo lagu dadaalo wanaajintooda. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: “Ma galo Jannada qof qaraabo goys ah”.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaṣilūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhāfūna sūa al-ḥisābi
